page.title: 18 Pocket Money in W.Stafford.
page.content: We decided to find out about the pocket money of 9-12 year old children in our school.These are the results :- 60% receive one pound or under 28% receive between 1 and 3 pounds 3% receive more than three pounds 8% receive no pocket money. Two-thirds have to earn their pocket money by; washing up (28%), house-work (26%), drying up (21%), gardening (13%),baby sitting(2%), cleaning the car(9%). 82% saved some of their money, 22% had to save some 26% spent their money on leisure 24% on food,drink and sweets 19% on school equipment 18% on books,comics 12% on their own clothes.
